ResearchProjectDef.label: Knowledge
ResearchProjectDef.description: You will learn the basics of LittleFairies and be able to make BrillianceWood.\nLittleFairy is required to create BrillianceWood.

ResearchProjectDef.label: BloodNursery
ResearchProjectDef.description: By dedicating a LittleFairy and certain other creatures, a BloodNursery can be built that can produce a stronger LittleFairy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Resource Recycling
ResearchProjectDef.description: Enhances BloodNursery and repurposes extra pieces that are not needed for LittleFairy production. This will allow us to obtain some of the skins and meat of the creatures we put into the BloodNursery.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Meat Furniture
ResearchProjectDef.description: You will be able to create furniture made of blood and flesh, which is a bit frightening.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Bloody BrillianceWood
ResearchProjectDef.description: You will be able to manufacture wood made of blood and a little wonder power.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Nursery Expansion
ResearchProjectDef.description: You will be able to create weapons and armor for the bloodthirsty wild LittleFairies.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Weapons Smithing
ResearchProjectDef.description: You will be able to take in the knowledge of human smithing and create weapons for LittleFairy that are a little stronger.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Totem
ResearchProjectDef.description: You will be able to build totems, a magical facility that operates in BrillianceWood.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Bloody Totem
ResearchProjectDef.description: You will be able to build more aggressive totems that will operate in BloodyBrillianceWood.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Imitation Technology
ResearchProjectDef.description: Tailor human technology for Little Fairies. In addition, it provides a way to preserve LittleFairies' favorite foods for longer periods of time.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Small Guns
ResearchProjectDef.description: It will be possible to create a special gun that can be handled by LittleFairy's body size.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Utility Collars
ResearchProjectDef.description: It will be possible to create collars with special features.

ResearchProjectDef.label: More Brilliance
ResearchProjectDef.description: You will gain new ways to grant LittleFairies new powers to make them stronger.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Utility Totem
ResearchProjectDef.description: You will be able to construct totems that are useful for colony life.
